reviews.text: I did not like the bathroom shower in this hotel. I will not stay there again. The shower has a sliding door on the opposite side of the water control. You get wet (cold water) in order to adjust the temperature due to the extreme far reach. You cannot control the water temperature unless your arm is more than three feet long. So you have to get zapped with cold water first. Not fun.
reviews.title: Horrable shower

reviews.text: We stopped here for one night on our way back from Colorado. We considered Amarillo but it's really hard to find a decent hotel there for some reason. We were pleasantly surprised by this hotel. It's fairly new and located near a Walmart so it was nice to be able to walk across the parking lot and get milk and apples for my kids. The staff was very friendly. The rooms are large and well maintained. We had a room on the 2nd floor facing the rear and it was quiet. They don't have microwaves in the rooms or refrigerators but they let us use their microwave in the kitchen. Breakfast was better than you would expect with a decent variety. We will definitely stay here again on our way back from Colorado!
reviews.title: Best overnight place when driving from CO to Dallas
Trip
reviews.text: Rooms very clean and new. Could hear doors slamming and the people above me walking across the floor. Did not eat the free breakfast but can say it looked good. The check in was quick and the staff helped get my luggage into my roo. Excellent staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hampton on our return trip to Texas. The room was clean, but not very well laid out. There was no way to see the TV from the chair, you had to sit on the bed. The TV was also on the "fritz", you had to keep trying to start until you hit the right spot. This is an older hotel. We were on the second floor and could hear the people above us moving around - there was a lot of creaking when they walked across the floor. On the "plus" side, the room was very quiet and the bed was pretty comfortable. We like to sleep in a very cold room and we were able to turn the AC down quite a bit. The fitness room was excellent. There was a treadmill, recumbent bike, free weights, an ellipitcal and weight training machine. The breakfast was OK, not up to the usual Hampton breakfast, but OK. The person overseeing the spread was not very good at replenishing.
reviews.title: OK hotel

reviews.text: Prior to arrival with my family. Room was not prepared. The desk inspected the room prior to giving us our key. He went in the room and changed the sheets and gave us a few towels. Bathroom was not cleaned. Room was not vacuumed. Bed was barely made. I requested a handicap room for my 95 year old grandmother. She was unable to use the facilities independently nor bath. We were in Childress for her sister's funeral. So our whole experience was that the Hampton Inn Childress does not care about their guests or standards Hilton is known for.
reviews.title: Room was not cleaned

reviews.text: I recently stayed here for 3 nights while in town for a funeral. The staff was super friendly, professional and very accommodating. The rooms were clean and comfortable. They let us use the meeting room to have our family lunch for free. Great place to stay! Only thing I would suggest would be refrigerators in the rooms.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.text: Stayed two nights for business. Staff worked hard to please. Beds comfortable as per Hampton's norm. Excellent workout room above the norm in this class! Right off the highway, easy access. Only suites have micro fridge, which cost me an extra $10/night. Very quiet. Staff friendly.
reviews.title: Convenient and comfy

reviews.text: We stay at this Hampton Inn several times a year and always feel welcome and staff is very friendly. The rooms are always clean and the breakfast is very good. We plan to stay here about 8 times a year. We highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Love the Hampton Inn in Childress, Texas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed a very comfortable night here. Nice décor in lobby and in rooms. Easy check in and out, clean room, decent towels, a clean and comfortable bed. The AC ran through the night to keep the room cool but because you can set the fan to stay on, it is only the compressor that kicks off and on. Never bothered us. There is a bench at the end of the bed and a coffee table so plenty of room for two pieces of luggage. Decent Wi-Fi. Typical Hampton breakfast. No complaints. Would stay here again.
reviews.title: Good sleep

reviews.text: Excellent and brand new hotel. Beautifully furnished. We picked it due to it's location, but were very happy w the stay. Breakfast is also included. Selections for breakfast very basic, but good quality and quite adequate. I was pleasantly surprised w overall quality of this hotel in a little town.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn in Childress texas

reviews.text: We originally wanted to make it to Amarillo as we traveled from Destin, Florida back home to Colorado. But things didn't work out as planned, so we had a night's stay in Childress instead. I was SO pleasantly surprised at how nice this hotel was! The outside is painted so nicely, parking lot is well lit and very clean, lobby and breakfast area are beautifully decorated! Front desk employees were very nice at check-in. We looked at the pool area but didn't use it. It seemed very clean and inviting. Workout room looked nice as well.
reviews.title: Great Hotel! 5 Stars for the Hotel and Amenities, 3 Stars for the Breakfast!
Great stay
reviews.text: The hotel is right beside a Walmart so you could even walk over if you needed to get anything.
Beds and pillows were very comfortable, room was super clean, bathroom was nice and clean as well. Loved it!
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.text: Downside: Although the coffee was super fresh and Hampton Inn quality, the breakfast itself seemed more like something you'd get at a much cheaper hotel. The eggs were so dry they were actually ball-like in texture. The French toast sticks were not in a warmer, but instead in a container you'd put pastries in. Who eats French toast sticks cold? The potatoes were cold. The sausage was good--cut into thin slices and actually tasty. The cereal couldn't be ruined and the oatmeal was actually good and not overcooked. They had a waffle machine as well--you can't go wrong when you are cooking it yourself. The breakfast was a huge disappointment, as we always look forward to great breakfasts at Hampton Inn Hotels. This wasn't up to par for their name.
reviews.title: Great Hampton halfway to CO!

reviews.text: I still give this place a 5/5 because the employees were super nice, parking lot was clean and safe, beds and pillows were comfy and room was super clean! Breakfast is always an added bonus for us, but at least the coffee was fresh! Location is perfect if you are traveling through--very easy to find and a Walmart is right there if you have forgotten any items!
reviews.title: Wedding Party reservations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were stranded in Childress, Texas due to automotive problems. The Hampton Inn came to our rescue in many ways. Special Thanks to Gilbert, the night manager. The room was comfortable and very clean. Try to get a room on the back side of the hotel, it can get noisy due to a lot of truck traffic (through no fault of Hampton Inn)
reviews.title: Stranded in Childress

reviews.text: Good if you just want to sleep, beds are nice with duvets, wireless slow, no HDTV, crappy microwaved hot food for breakfast, AC goes on and off all night so if you're a light sleeper it will wake you every time it starts.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn Childress

reviews.text: We were exhausted and so happy with an awesome room, bed, shower and breakfast! Comfortable bed great sheets. Overslept from a wonderful night sleep. Massage shower head was nice on the sore back. Nice selection at breakfast, great coffee.
reviews.title: Awesome night sleep, great price!!!

reviews.text: Great price! Perfect, Thank you!
reviews.title: Great night for tired guests

reviews.text: Very nice and CLEAN hotel. Staff was friendly and helpful. Bed was very comfortable and according to the ads even the duvets are washed after each guest. We have searched for a nice hotel in the area and now we have found one! We will stay here again every time we travel to Colorado.
reviews.title: Great Price
